values="M403.5,294Q372,338,343,393Q314,448,254,435.5Q194,423,138,397.5Q82,372,88,311Q94,250,86,187.5Q78,125,134,95.5Q190,66,253,57Q316,48,362,91.5Q408,135,421.5,192.5Q435,250,403.5,294Z;M469.34657,320.38487Q443.8468,390.76973,373.53877,402.1156Q303.23073,413.46147,238.88463,448.30757Q174.53853,483.15367,122.76833,431.6929Q70.99814,380.23213,76.84563,315.11607Q82.69313,250,78.9227,186.3071Q75.15227,122.6142,131.92223,91.73003Q188.6922,60.84587,253.2305,51.539Q317.7688,42.23213,359.5759,90.92433Q401.383,139.61653,448.11467,194.80827Q494.84633,250,469.34657,320.38487Z;M460.19079,314.81752Q429.48296,379.63503,366.74655,397.33779Q304.01014,415.04055,238.62673,450.6401Q173.24331,486.23965,141.80231,418.853Q110.3613,351.46635,87.51337,300.73317Q64.66545,250,86.56406,198.80231Q108.46268,147.60462,149.75669,107.39355Q191.05069,67.18248,258.9189,40.41566Q326.7871,13.64883,381.21107,64.45621Q435.63503,115.26359,463.26683,182.63179Q490.89862,250,460.19079,314.81752Z;M423.38828,307.00416Q406.39243,364.00831,353.55217,384.57202Q300.71191,405.13573,242.06787,430.50416Q183.42382,455.87258,116.5554,425.63666Q49.68697,395.40075,58.87581,322.70037Q68.06464,250,86.66067,197.31625Q105.2567,144.63251,148.86843,108.53648Q192.48015,72.44045,252.10019,66.13989Q311.72022,59.83933,378.54063,84.21929Q445.36105,108.59925,442.87258,179.29963Q440.38412,250,423.38828,307.00416Z;M428.88107,298.41731Q382.87896,346.83463,343.6411,381.94757Q304.40324,417.06052,249.73188,417.66327Q195.06052,418.26602,121.90324,407.33463Q48.74595,396.40324,42.90922,323.20162Q37.07249,250,50.04223,182.03624Q63.01197,114.07249,129.2076,98.49191Q195.40324,82.91133,251.0746,78.83673Q306.74595,74.76214,356.50598,105.64321Q406.26602,136.52427,440.5746,193.26214Q474.88318,250,428.88107,298.41731Z;M403.5,294Q372,338,343,393Q314,448,254,435.5Q194,423,138,397.5Q82,372,88,311Q94,250,86,187.5Q78,125,134,95.5Q190,66,253,57Q316,48,362,91.5Q408,135,421.5,192.5Q435,250,403.5,294Z"></animate></path><path id="blob" fill="url(#gradient)" style="opacity: 1;"><animate attributeName="d" dur="25000ms" repeatCount="indefinite" id="blob" fill="url(#gradient)" style="opacity: 1;"><animate attributeName="d" dur="25000ms" repeatCount="indefinite" values="M410.95278,296.31131Q377.83016,342.62262,346.59668,396.40799Q315.3632,450.19336,253.66275,438.70512Q191.9623,427.21687,143.72172,394.79004Q95.48115,362.3632,86.24057,306.1816Q77,250,74.51885,185.3632Q72.0377,120.72639,123.0377,68.91975Q174.0377,17.1131,239.88914,47.47163Q305.74057,77.83016,366.40332,99.75233Q427.06607,121.67451,435.57074,185.83725Q444.0754,250,410.95278,296.31131Z;M460.19079,314.81752Q429.48296,379.63503,366.74655,397.33779Q304.01014,415.04055,238.62673,450.6401Q173.24331,486.23965,141.80231,418.853Q110.3613,351.46635,87.51337,300.73317Q64.66545,250,86.56406,198.80231Q108.46268,147.60462,149.75669,107.39355Q191.05069,67.18248,258.9189,40.41566Q326.7871,13.64883,381.21107,64.45621Q435.63503,115.26359,463.26683,182.63179Q490.89862,250,460.19079,314.81752Z;M439.43806,316.51312Q432.44085,383.02623,370.39398,407.14258Q308.3471,431.25893,240.13979,459.78516Q171.93248,488.31139,132.30301,426.26451Q92.67355,364.21763,63.21484,307.10882Q33.75613,250,44.06194,178.90151Q54.36774,107.80301,118.67355,75.31613Q182.97935,42.82924,240.60882,72.66602Q298.23828,102.50279,368.10882,107.87054Q437.97935,113.23828,442.20731,181.61914Q446.43527,250,439.43806,316.51312Z;M428.88107,298.41731Q382.87896,346.83463,343.6411,381.94757Q304.40324,417.06052,249.73188,417.66327Q195.06052,418.26602,121.90324,407.33463Q48.74595,396.40324,42.90922,323.20162Q37.07249,250,50.04223,182.03624Q63.01197,114.07249,129.2076,98.49191Q195.40324,82.91133,251.0746,78.83673Q306.74595,74.76214,356.50598,105.64321Q406.26602,136.52427,440.5746,193.26214Q474.88318,250,428.88107,298.41731Z;M469.34657,320.38487Q443.8468,390.76973,373.53877,402.1156Q303.23073,413.46147,238.88463,448.30757Q174.53853,483.15367,122.76833,431.6929Q70.99814,380.23213,76.84563,315.11607Q82.69313,250,78.9227,186.3071Q75.15227,122.6142,131.92223,91.73003Q188.6922,60.84587,253.2305,51.539Q317.7688,42.23213,359.5759,90.92433Q401.383,139.61653,448.11467,194.80827Q494.84633,250,469.34657,320.38487Z;M410.95278,296.31131Q377.83 <svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 500 500" width="100%" id="blobSvg" style={{opacity: 1}}>
    <defs>
      <linearGradient id="gradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
        <stop offset="0%" style={{stopColor: "rgb(235, 178, 70)"}}></stop>
        <stop offset="100%" style={{stopColor: "rgb(228, 59, 192)"}}></stop>
      </linearGradient>
    </defs>
    <path id="blob" fill="url(#gradient)" style={{opacity: 1}} d="M437.20545,311.82292Q441.89352,373.64584,380.77431,387.66608Q319.65509,401.68633,271.82754,416.34317Q224,431,184.22569,401.27431Q144.45139,371.54861,81.45601,344.74769Q18.46064,317.94676,58.87153,261.64584Q99.28242,205.34491,102.46413,144.38253Q105.64584,83.42014,164.05961,69.5926Q222.47338,55.76506,274.24769,69.97338Q326.02199,84.18171,376.989,109.95139Q427.95601,135.72107,430.23669,192.86053Q432.51737,250,437.20545,311.82292Z"></path>
  </svg>



import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react";
import { useSpring, animated } from "react-spring";
import blobs from "blobs";
import { gsap } from "gsap";

const options = {
  complexity: 0.6, // Increased complexity
  contrast: 0.6,
  guides: false,
  size: 500,
  color: "hsl(6.13, 73.23%, 49.8%)",
  stroke: 0
};

const Tester = () => {
  const [blob, setBlob] = useState(blobs.editable(options));
  const [isHovered, setHovered] = useState(false); // New state for hover status

  const blobSpring = useSpring({
    config: { duration: isHovered ? 500 : 3000 }, // Adjust duration based on hover status
    from: {
      d: blob.children[0].children[0].attributes.d
    },
    to: async (next) => {
      while (1) {
        await next({
          d: blobs.editable(options).children[0].children[0].attributes.d
        });
      }
    }
  });

  useEffect(() => {
    const colors = ["#ff057c", "#800f86", "#1619b9", "#1ba8e9"];
    const blobs = ["#blob1", "#blob2", "#blob3", "#blob4"];
    blobs.forEach((blob, index) => {
      gsap.to(blob, {
        fill: colors[(index + 1) % colors.length],
        duration: 2,
        repeat: -1,
        yoyo: true,
        ease: "sine.inOut"
      });
    });
  }, []);

  return (
    <svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 500 500" width="100%" id="blobSvg" style={{opacity: 1}}>
      <animated.path id="blob1" fill="#ff057c" style={{opacity: 1}} 
        d={blobSpring.d} 
        onMouseEnter={() => setHovered(true)} // Set isHovered to true when mouse enters
        onMouseLeave={() => setHovered(false)} // Set isHovered to false when mouse leaves
      />
      <animated.path id="blob2" fill="#800f86" style={{opacity: 1}} 
        d={blobSpring.d} 
        onMouseEnter={() => setHovered(true)} // Set isHovered to true when mouse enters
        onMouseLeave={() => setHovered(false)} // Set isHovered to false when mouse leaves
      />
      <animated.path id="blob3" fill="#1619b9" style={{opacity: 1}} 
        d={blobSpring.d} 
        onMouseEnter={() => setHovered(true)} // Set isHovered to true when mouse enters
        onMouseLeave={() => setHovered(false)} // Set isHovered to false when mouse leaves
      />
      <animated.path id="blob4" fill="#1ba8e9" style={{opacity: 1}} 
        d={blobSpring.d} 
        onMouseEnter={() => setHovered(true)} // Set isHovered to true when mouse enters
        onMouseLeave={() => setHovered(false)} // Set isHovered to false when mouse leaves
      />
    </svg>
  );
};

export default Tester;

import React, { useState } from "react";
import { useSpring, animated } from "react-spring";
import blobs from "blobs";

const options = {
  complexity: 0.6, // Increased complexity
  contrast: 0.6,
  guides: false,
  size: 500,
  color: "hsl(6.13, 73.23%, 49.8%)",
  stroke: 0
};

const Tester = () => {
  const [blob, setBlob] = useState(blobs.editable(options));
  const [isHovered, setHovered] = useState(false); // New state for hover status

  const blobSpring = useSpring({
    config: { duration: isHovered ? 500 : 3000 }, // Adjust duration based on hover status
    from: {
      d: blob.children[0].children[0].attributes.d
    },
    to: async (next) => {
      while (1) {
        await next({
          d: blobs.editable(options).children[0].children[0].attributes.d
        });
      }
    }
  });

  return (
    <svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 500 500" width="100%" id="blobSvg" style={{opacity: 1}}>
      <defs>
        <linearGradient id="gradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
          <stop offset="0%" style={{stopColor: "rgb(235, 178, 70)"}}></stop>
          <stop offset="100%" style={{stopColor: "rgb(228, 59, 192)"}}></stop>
        </linearGradient>

        {/* Add this filter to create the glow effect */}
        <filter id="glow">
          <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="2.5" result="coloredBlur"/>
          <feMerge>
            <feMergeNode in="coloredBlur"/>
            <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
          </feMerge>
        </filter>
      </defs>
      <animated.path id="blob" fill="url(#gradient)" style={{opacity: 1, filter: 'url(#glow)'}} 
        d={blobSpring.d} 
        onMouseEnter={() => setHovered(true)} // Set isHovered to true when mouse enters
        onMouseLeave={() => setHovered(false)} // Set isHovered to false when mouse leaves
      />
    </svg>
  );
};

export default Tester;
